import React, { useState } from "react"; import Footer from "./Footer"; import NavBar from "./NavBar"; import "./style.component.css"; const Checkout = () => { const [cart, setCart] = useState([]); // State to manage cart items const removeFromCart = (courseId) => { setCart(cart.filter((course) => course.id !== courseId)); }; // Sample courses data const courses = [ { id: 1, title: "Course 1", price: 10 }, { id: 2, title: "Course 2", price: 20 }, { id: 3, title: "Course 3", price: 30 }, ]; // Function to add item to cart const addToCart = (course) => { setCart([...cart, course]); }; // Calculate subtotal const subtotal = cart.reduce((total, course) => total + course.price, 0); return ( <>
